aka: Edgar Allan Poe's Requiem for the Damned

writer.name: 罗伯特·汀奈尔 Robert Tinnell

director.name: 罗伯特·汀奈尔 Robert Tinnell

trans_title: Edgar Allan Poe's Requiem for the Damned
introduction: Edgar Allan Poe. For nearly two hundred years his stories of the macabre have shocked and terrified audiences. And now, inspired by five of Poe's most terrifying tales, five filmmakers have banded together to create the ultimate tribute to the master: Edgar Allan Poe's Requiem For The Damned - featuring adaptations of : The Fall of the House of Usher, The Pit and the Pendulum, The Black Cat, The Tell-Tale Heart, The Murders in the Rue Morgue.
